name: (Delta)
description:
(Delta) - A puzzle platformer  with a 'time gun' - Made in 48 hours for GMTK (Game Makers Toolkit) Jam. 

Update - 17/07 - I wanted to make it easier for people to play my game, so I bought the web export for Gamemaker 2 and embedded an HTML5 version of the game. Nothing has changed from when I entered it and you can still download the original Windows version as well.
